gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop
Class HL7SDKDragSourceAdapter

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop.HL7SDKDragSourceAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener, java.util.EventListener
public class HL7SDKDragSourceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener

This Adapter class implements java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener interface to provide support for Drag action.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $
